text: Marthe Keller (born 28 January 1945 in Basel) is a television, movie and stage actress who was originally from Switzerland. She starred opposite Dustin Hoffman in the movie Marathon Man and performed in Black Sunday the following year. == Other websites == * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss movie actors Category:Swiss stage actors Category:Swiss television actors Category:Actors from Basel
title: Marthe Keller
